authentication.desc_change_password: In order to reset your password, please provide us your email. We will send you an email momentarily.
authentication.success_send: You will receive an email shortly to reset your password
authentication.description_identification: Enjoy added benefits and a richer experience by creating a personal account
authentication.err_email_format: Please enter a valid email address
authentication.des_register:
Continue with your email address.
Sign in with your GUCCI email and password or create a profile if you are new.
